short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sounds that capture what you're really thinking during team meetings...

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Have you ever seen someone in your daily standup move a JIRA ticket all the way from the backlog to the done column? You need to throw some shade... but the right amount. Have this extension at the ready to celebrate, while encouraging your teammates to never have this sound played at them again!
